channel.title: brazos bend state park – Here and There
channel.description: Scott and Jackie's Travels – Thousand Trails Reviews, Campground Reviews, Fulltime RVing, European Travel

item.title: Brazos Bend listed as one of the best
item.dc:creator: grscott
item.description: The Toronto Sun travel page has a list of 10 great camp sites around the world and our “home park” Brazos Bend State Park made that list!  Brazos Bend has some pretty hefty company on the list.  Check it out.
item.content:encoded: The Toronto Sun travel page has a list of 10 great camp sites around the world and our “home park” Brazos Bend State Park made that list!  Brazos Bend has some pretty hefty company on the list.  Check it out.
